ygData.subject: Re: Brian, why better ac for rogues, bards, and rangers?
ygData.msgSnippet: I still havent received a SS of the BP. I think our friend who had it may have destroyed since he already has Umbral. I do have to say that in comparison, our
ygData.messageBody:
I still havent received a SS of the BP. I think our
friend who had it may have destroyed since he already
has Umbral.

I do have to say that in comparison, our new stuff
statwise isnt as good as some. But i will say we arent
the only ones. Ive been looking at various pieces of
the new armor and a lot of it isnt all that great for
several of the classes.
Though i am envious of the ranger greaves. I like AGI.

I think this armor came a little too late. Its too
easy to just go buy better stuff now. If these items
had come out a few months ago, we would be happier.
But since it is so easy to get better items, that
makes this stuff seem worthless.

I cant wait to see which one of our items has Charisma
as a stat.

P.S. I dont think Brian bothers with this board
anymore

--- Chip Paul <cpaul@...> wrote:
> I don't understand why the chain based armor of the
> rangers has a
> higher AC than our darkforge armor, and arguably
> better statistics.
> All of the ranger armor I've seen has excellent
> bonuses to pertinent
> stats. Example.
>
> Ivy etched tunic (ranger): 19AC +3Str +3Wis +30HP
> Darkforge breastplate (sk): 18AC +10Sta +3Mr
>
> I don't know exactly how stamina works, but I know
> that the +6 stamina
> on my charred bp equates to about 13HP for me at
> level 33.
>
> The leggings...
> Lambent greaves (bard): 13AC +1Cha +5Agi weight 4.0
> Darkforge greaves(sk): 11AC +9Sta +3Mr weight 7
> Ivy Etched greaves(rng): 12AC +5Agi +5Fire +5Cold
>
> Bard: 2 AC more and weighs 3lbs less. Also, the
> Agi bonus will give
> another point or two of ac.
>
> Ranger: 1 more AC
>
> I hear they are upping the crusader spawns, which is
> good, but
> really why do the rangers have higher ac on their
> chain armor? It
> doesn't make sense.
>
> Xilith
>
>
